short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SharksTab Chrome extension is designed to bring beautiful images of a variety of sharks species to your browser's new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SharkTab brings beautiful images of a variety of sharks species to your browserâ€™s new tab.

Once installed you can choose your preferred background from one of the many images in its image library.

By clicking "Add to chrome", you accept and agree to installing SharksTab extension and setting Chrome New Tab search to that provided by the service.

The search will be powered by Microsoft Bing.
